snippet: Players from Libya’s national soccer team, some of whom supported opposing sides in the toppling of Muammar el-Qaddafi, can clinch a berth in the African Cup of Nations on Saturday.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )

lead_paragraph: Players from Libya’s national soccer team, some of whom supported opposing sides in the toppling of Muammar el-Qaddafi, can clinch a berth in the African Cup of Nations on Saturday.

headline.main: Split by War, Libya’s Team Is United by New Goal
headline.print_headline: Split by War, Libya’s Team Is United by New Goal
headline.seo: Split by War, Libya’s Team United Around New Goal
